SpecialEducationExitReasonDescriptor.Description: Student exited the Special Education program and related services because of transfering out another educational organization
Student exited the Special Education program and related services because of graduating with a diploma.
Student exited the Special Education program and related services because of graduating with a certificate of completion.

SpecialEducationExitReasonDescriptor.ShortDescription: Reached the maximum age limit for services
SpecialEducationExitReasonDescriptor.Description: Student exited the Special Education program and related services because of an ineligibility other than reaching the maximum age limit.

SpecialEducationExitReasonDescriptor.CodeValue: No longer eligible for Special Education
SpecialEducationExitReasonDescriptor.ShortDescription: No longer eligible for Special Education
SpecialEducationExitReasonDescriptor.Description: Student exited the Special Education program and related services because of an ineligibility other than reaching age limit
Student exited the Special Education program and related services because of dropping out of school.
Student exited the Special Education program and related services for any reason other than listed in the descriptor.
